Safe Driving Score Driving Tips Actively pay attention to your actions and those of the drivers around you when you are driving Familiarize yourself with the controls and release the handbrake before you start rolling Find the best seating position for you and adjust the mirrors Check the surroundings while reverse parking your car Use turn signals and check mirrors before splitting lanes Slow down before turning and maintain a consistent speed throughout the turn Last 3 Driving Score 15/04/2021 KM AM 100:33 10:09 04:22 Driving Score Rides Dashboard More

Bluetooth Devices Enable GPS Turn on GPS Turn off GPS Update Period in Seconds The length of time between querying new position in seconds Update Period in Meters Min Distance between location updates, in meters OBD Protocol Select OBD Protocol to use Imperial Units Enable imperial units Go back to metric units Update Period in Seconds The length of time between querying vehicle data in seconds Maximum Fuel Economy Value Any fuel economy values larger than this will be thrown out Volumetric Efficiency (eg 0.85) Used for fuel economy on vehicles without MAF sensor Volumetric Efficiency Engine Displacement (liters) Used for fuel economy on vehicles without MAF sensor Reader Config Commands Commands to configure bluetooth reader, separate with new line Select the commands you would like to see in real-time.
